content.detailedDescription:
I was on the way with my wife direction to border ukraine-poland. before the korostenj road crossing, one disk has flown slowly bevor our car, motor went out, i was shocked. my wife has checking back our car still three discs, they fly the same direction as the first disc. we are driven to korostenj and stayed in a motel, i told an reception that we saw on the road e373 vour discs. the receptionist told me that after chernobil disaster,the same discs fly every day in the region. we went in the room and could not sleep. tomorrow we are continued our trip to border.(sorry for my english ).
sebastian.
content.summary: Vour disks crossing the road e373

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown

Photo taken after motor vehicle crash, observing crash incident, the picture was taken professionally by local news paper, on the aberystwyth to langurig
think it is a470, on west second hair pin bend

content.detailedDescription: Swimming inn pool with 3 friends . each of us observed over the northern sky that appeared to change colors and move in radom rapidly patterns. the look like a shootings war & vanish,
content.summary: Many small objects that seemed to be starts when stationary, but would suddenly move in random patterns covering huge distance of sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck  with my wife looking at the stars at around 10:30 pm when i noticed a bright orange light flying.  i thought it was an airplane with an orange light but never seen one before. there was an airplane in the sky to the far left of it going in the same direction, the unknown object passed the airplane quickly then as it flew directly over us we saw it was a disc shape that had a orange aura circling a solid circle object. we were shocked and could not understand what that could have been.  we couldn't see it anymore when it flew out of sight.  we have never seen a round aircraft.  we live near an airport and have never seen an airplane that looked like this.
content.summary: Watched it fly over the tree line then over us.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on balcony with my brother while he was explaining the history of the buildings when i noticed object. it was not until later going back that i actually had a true belief in what i had just seen. this may have been something else but i don't know i have photograph. this is not my first encounter myself and my daughter and friend were walking across fields taking dog for walk few years earlier and we all noticed a silver object popping in and out of a cloud. it then hovered out in clear sight for about a minute and then just excellerated at such a speed. i turned to my daughter and her friend and said to them "did you just see that" and they looked so frightened so i told them it must have been a helicopter but it certainly wasn't it made no noise it is similar to the shape of the one in the photo and it moved like nothing i have ever seen. it was as if they were watching us! i have seen other things and experienced through the years but my choice has been to ignore not through ignorance but through shame and fear. thank you.
content.summary: Seen object in sky but no noise

content.detailedDescription:
i can vouch that  the following video is 100% real. i am remaining anonymous to avoid government reprisals.   [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
 if you ever wanted to truly see how aliens are monitoring or studying us, and witness their technology, this video is it.
the video is a black and white infrared recording using a l3 mx15 eoir camera. the ir video uses back hot, meaning the blacker something is the hotter, or fuller of energy it is. the video was leaked onto youtube because the federal agents who recorded it realized the federal government was not interested in disclosing it. the video was recorded from the screen of a laptop using a iphone type device. spanish is heard as background noise to distort the leakerâ€™s voices so they are not discovered. disregard all audio. lastly, the poster of the video speculates it was recorded from a cbp blackhawk. in reality it was recorded by a cbp dhc8 turboprop maritime patrol aircraft. this is not a maybe, this is 100% alien technology on earth, in our skies, and under our oceans. the video was taken in aguadilla puerto rico, and can be verified by calling cbp caribbean air and marine branch, and aguadilla airport control tower (the ufo was over the airport without permission and tower controllers saw it and tracked it on radar.
on april 25, 2013 at 2122 local/april 26, 2013 0122z a customs and border protection caribbean air and marine branch dhc8 maritime patrol aircraft was on a routine patrol when it encountered a ufo immediately after takeoff. the object was spotted visually by the captain of the aircraft, and the aguadilla control tower operator. it appeared to have a strange red light.  the customs and border protection crew thought the aircraft might be a smuggler so they began to follow the ufo, and record a ir video. the ufo circled the aguadilla airport and made its way to the ocean. initially the ufo appears as a forward flying horseshoe, then as it makes its way to the ocean, it changes its configuration to a more spherical shape. the ufo skims on top of the ocean, and submerges, unaffected by the hydrodynamic forces. watch the video carefully at 01:24:39 (time in upper left corner) when the object gets really dark (hot) another ufo actually pops out of the ocean and joins the original ufo in formation. then both ufoâ€™s make controlled entries into the ocean.  alien technology is no doubt under the ocean near puerto rico!
content.summary: Customs and border protection aircraft records ufo in aguadilla puerto rico

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a park near my home and i see 3 fire ball in the sky going from north to south  very fast .. .No1 didnt stop no 2 stop and stay there and he we there when a left the park 30 min laterand the no 3 stop where the no 2 is  stop and go up at 45 degree to the space
content.summary: See 3 fireball in the sky moving from north to south

content.detailedDescription: I just watched a clip of a news report submitted by castanet.Net of a ufo spotted during a report of a fire in west kelowna,bc canada on 17 july 2014 we all see and they focus on the ufo that goes between the clouds but can and did you see the object that zips thru the screen at about 0.30to 0.33 at a blink of an eye ???It moves  from right to left on the screen at tremendous speed .....Can you see clip and use your slow motion equipment and see what i saw???? i thought you would like this bit of information thanks and hope to be hearing from you soon .....It zips right above and past the truck in the road and the driver never seen it come or go.....Let me know i have replayed it over and over just don't know how to slow down clip any slower then my laptop can do....Oh the whole clip is only 0.57 long the clip i watched from yahoo but i belive its on youtube or directly from castanet.Net please let me know and i wonder how many others saw this you have to look its fast................
content.summary: In clip of fire report the one ufo is seen going between clouds but they missed the one  i saw

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend making a photo tour in istanbul.  we were in the sultan ahmet area near to the blue mosque around 3.30pm.  the sky was very clear and blue.  

i looked across to the mosque and then looked up and seen the object coming directly above.  it seemed to be moving around the same speed as a high level airline at 30000 feet. 

i pointed it out to my friend and he also could see it, we both immediately agreed it was no plane. we watched it to continue to move for around 3 seconds before i raised my camera.

i fully zoomed my 135 mm lens and got 1 picture,  i didn't have time to adjust the camera settings for maximum exposure etc but focus was sharp.

we quickly reviewed the image, i went to retake some more pictures but then the object vanished. 

the object was defiantly a sphere and looked white/metallic.  upon inspection of the image a red colour is also seen.

after zooming in on the image we were not sure what it was, we thought maybe a drone but as it vanished we were not convinced either.

i will send the camera raw image and a quick cropped edit.  no enhancements to either.
content.summary: Looked up, seen orb directly above, took photo, went to take another and it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife was heading to work. my daughter said look birds, the birds flew by and in the background were two objects moving which we're silver disc shapes and i speed up to keep up and a tree came up also but i could still see the objects. they started going up when we passed the tree they were gone! but i could still see them then just took off no sound and also it was a clear day.
content.summary: Me and my wife going to work daughter said look birds but birds flew over a tree and in the background 2 silver objects moving so i speeded up and told my wife look. objects were moving then went straight up and gone!

content.detailedDescription: Out my backdoor and were cooking there was my brother and i and 3 kids the oldest being 7yrs old.  we saw a bight silver object moving across the sky and i ran in to get the binoculars and camera.  it made no noise and left no trail.  we got it in the sight with the binoculars and my brother and myself and the 7 yr old watched and had a good look at it.  shiny reflective silver with no markings looked more like an aircraft but too quiet and slow.  it was very big.  got a pic but all you see is a dot i can't zoom it in to see what we saw through the binoculars.  ft. campbell flies refueling maneuvers over us and their helicopters land about a mile away from us.  it moved from west to east and could see it bank to turn then went behind some low lying clouds.  my brother and i used to fly all the time we are from an aviation family and it was different.
content.summary: Bright silver object way below jet height moving quietly and a steady pace.  at first thought it was a missile or experimental craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard when i say a bright orange light traveling at relatively high speed from the southwest to the northeast.  i was followed a few seconds later by another bright orange light along the same path.  there were an additional seven or eight of these lights that followed similar though not identical paths.  each light was visible for approximately ten seconds before it disappeared to the northeast.  in some cases two lights were visible at the same time. i went into my house to get binoculars and my wife followed me outside and we saw another light with the same characteristics.  i observed the last orange light through the binoculars. the light appeared to be associated with a solid object.  it did not have the characteristic red and green lights of an aircraft and it did not blink or pulsate.  there was no sound associated with the objects.  there was a thin cloud layer to northeast at the time; the sky to the southwest was clear.  i observed conventional aircraft before and after the event and they were easily identifiable as such, both with the unaided eye and later, with the binoculars; the separation of navigation lights and the blinking of the lights were easily discerned with binoculars. the aircraft had a faint but discernable sound characteristic of jet aircraft.  the conventional aircraft appeared to be at a high altitude (above 20,000 feet).  the behavior and appearance of the orange lights were entirely different from the conventional aircraft. i cannot estimate the altitude of the orange lights since it would depend on their size.  the were either relative low and of some size, or quite high and large; in either case, the lights were much brighter than stars or conventional aircraft.
content.summary: A series of silent, bright orange lights flew in succession from the sw to the ne separeted by 5 seconcds to a minute.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the patio of a bar with a friend of mine when someone else on the patio pointed out an object in the sky. it was hard to tell, but it looked like there were two small red lights next to one another. my hunch is that it was only one aircraft with two lights. the object had to have been at a very high altitude. my initial thought was that it was a satellite and i expressed that to everyone, but then it abruptly stopped, changed direction for a moment (moving directly south) then began moving southeast again. it was moderately alarming, but colorado springs does have a lot of military activity around it. i wasn't sure if something like that could be a drone or another military aircraft. i don't know if drones can change flightpath that easily. eventually the object flew out of sight heading southeast.
content.summary: Ufo spotted heading se over colorado springs

content.detailedDescription: Walking up driveway at 1003pm on 8/15/14 when i observed three red orbs to the east through treeline. observed these orbs three different times over a 15 min period. hovered, pulsated, moved slowly up and down and left to right. they eventually faded out at different times. this is the 3rd time these objects have been observed this year in this area, 4/20, 7/4, and 8/15. i have video/pics from last two incidents. chinese lanterns? i think not. some kind of drones perhaps, but from where?
content.summary: 3 reddish/orange orbs hovering, pulsating, moving independently of each other

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. my name is yuji mashiko, i am a ufo resercher,author and translator in japan.
 recently i have conducted 4 day camping at tokachidake mountain area which has been famous for ufo sightings for decades, and i have successfully videotaped ufo flying with zigzag motion at a high speed.
 the japanese news agencies showed a strong interest in my video sand they put them on their news site.

the news agency shows my videos in ther youtube account and i added my english explanation to that site. the links of youtube are introduced in the site of national ufo reporting center. you can search the article with following title - ufo sightings above tokachidake,hokkaido,japan 

the original videos look clearer than these youtube versions,so i have herewith attached the original ones.


here is my explanation on my sightings in 2014 and in 2010.


ufo with zigzag motion at a high speed â€“ june, 2014

this video was taken at 23:26 p.M. on june 24, 2014 at the camping site near mt. tokachidake (an active volcano in the northern part of japan), which has been famous for ufo sightings for decades. you can see a bright object soaring up from the bottom right corner of the video screen, but in reality, my camera was facing the zenith, and the object was moving horizontally across the sky from the east to the south. i fixed my camera position and did not follow the object, so the zigzag motion of the object was not because of camera shake. i was the only one looking up the sky and other people (mountain climbers) were already sleeping in their tents.

since the site was at an altitude of 1200 meters and the temperature was very low at night, there were no insects flying, and the fireflies (lightning bugs) do not exist in the area (the fireflies do not fly at such a high speed in the first place and my camera cannot catch such dim lights). the site was completely dark and there were no outdoor lights nearby (and it was a dark moonless night). i could see many stars in the sky with the naked eyes, but my small digital camera (casio ex-h10) could not catch any starlight. so you can guess how bright that object actually was.

these video clips are for the general citizens, so i did not go into details in my explanation especially regarding somewhat mysterious incident occurred before the ufo appeared.
  
about one and half hours before i saw ufo, i was surprised by a small mechanical sound that i heard from my left side (no more than two feet from where i was standing in the camping site), and i saw a long-haired young woman in white clothes. as i mentioned,the site was almost completely dark and i could not even see my shoes very well, so i could narrowly recognized that woman but could not see her face. then i saw a small and round red light in front of her chest or her solar plexus. i supposed she would be fixing her camera to a tripod to take pictures of beautiful starry sky (but i did not actually see any camera or tripod) . that slender lady was about 5 feet and 7 inches tall and had black hair.
  
although i wondered why she was working in the darkness without any lights, i stepped back silently because she did not seem to have noticed that i was standing so close to her,and i did not want to surpise a young woman in the darkness. after that i kept standing for a while at some distance from her, but the next time i found that she was gone - disappeared without making any sounds of walking. in the camping site,i could hear footsteps very well even if they were more than 20 meters away.
  
i wondered where she had gone because i did not hear any sounds of car. it was too dangerous for anyone to leave the site on foot because there were wild bears often appear in that area. she was not looking up overhead but straight ahead to the east where the tokachidake mountains rises - and it was the very direction where the ufo appeard about one and half hours later.
  
although there is no certain links between that mysterious lady and the ufo, i have to say that i had seen another mysterious yong gentleman who suddenly disappeard before another ufo appeared in the sky when i was waiting for the chance to videotaple ufo on the beach of kamakura on february 25 in 2014.  at that time,i saw a large disk-shaped green ufo that circled over my head and flew away. i was so surprised to see the ufo at a such close range that i momentarily forgot about taking its picture even though i had my camra at hand. 
  
having had such similar two experiences, i came to believe that the mysterious lady and the gentleman may have somthing to do with the ufos that appeared after these mysterious people disappered.

i have videotaped night scenes with my digital camera many times but i have never seen any digital noises. on the other hand, i have heard from my friends that they had witnessed a strange bright object flying with the zigzag motion in hokkaido area which is one of the most famous ufo hot-spots in japan. 

for the past several years, i have debunked many fake photos and videos as well as mistaken ufo reports, but it does not mean that i am a non-believer. i just wish to know the truth only. so i have conducted a camping in hokkaido which is very far from tokyo where i live. and fortunately i had opportunities to videotape the flying objects in 2010 and 2014 as you can see here
 

ufo with zigzag motion â€“ june 25, 2010 

this video was taken at 23:06 p.M. on june 25, 2010 at the foot of mt. tokachidake (an active volcano in the northern part of japan), which has been famous for ufo sightings for decades. near the bottom left corner of the video, you can see two lights showing zigzag motions, keeping the same distance between them. in the past, during the daytime around this area, my friend witnessed a strange oval object with two lights, one each on the left and the right edges, so i suppose that would be the reason for these two lights keeping the same distance. i fixed my camera position and did not follow the lights, so the zigzag motion of the object was not because of camera shake.

although the lights were moving around a lower part of the sky, it does not mean they were close to the ground because i was standing on the plateau looking down the wild forest and valley below. the site was a kind of dangerous area where wild bears often appeared, so no one could fly an led night kite or anything else in the wild forest or valley in the middle of the night. the site was at an altitude of 1200 meters and the temperature was very low at night. it was completely dark and i could see many stars in the sky with the naked eyes, but my small digital camera (casio ex-h10) could not catch any starlight. so you can guess how bright that object actually was.
content.summary: Fast zigzag movement with brigh light,but it was not a firefly or a light-reflected insect because they did not exist there

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to play with my cat when i looked up and saw a craft zipping around over downtown kansas city with no lights and would come to a complete stop and strobe then with no lights on you could see it fly to another spot and strobe a bright white light once then continue about 5 times.  it stopped after that but i continued to sky watch for another hour and a half and saw a few more strange things i call moving stars and one did stop then start again  i watch the sky a lot and know it for sure was strange and was to big and fast to be any kind of remote control craft. it was very strange who when it moved with no lights you could see it and was like a turtle egg in color and shape and the strobe was very brilliant white.  i have seen the same craft in the past glow orange before like a non-translucent  glass or those new see threw cinder blocks in which light can pass through lights from the inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo zipping around no light then would hover and do one strobe then zip around to another spot with no light on only strobed once when stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch having a smoke this object travelled from west to east  and glowed orange i noticed it because i have never seen such an object then it turned 90 degrees and then proceeded south towards lake there was no sounds at all. other people in neighbourhood witnessed the object as well and had called the police.
content.summary: This was an orange object that was travelling from west to east then as it was close to our street it made a sharp ninety degree turn and began travelling towards the lake which is south. there were a bunch of people who saw this and had actually called t

content.detailedDescription: Standing in my driveway observed a deep color red object moving towards me from the south to south west.Continued to move towards me overhead but not directly overhead. then as appeared from no where it disappeared east of me. elevation between 500 to a 1000 ft. object was disc orb shape made no sound, and some kind of upsidedown tripod shape object under the front of the object. i new it was no plane for several reasons, and it something i have never seen before. i was not scared or nervous i was calm through the very short time i saw it, i noticed people down the block standing in their front yards watching the same thing, but we never made contact with each other.
content.summary: Bright deep red, orb,oval shape with upsidedown tripod landing aparatus

content.detailedDescription: Took a photo of the sunrise. didn't notice any object until i viewed the picture
content.summary: Took this picture then observed the orange orb in the picture

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside onto my deck looking east at around 11 pm and saw a pulsating star-like orb in the sky near the horizon. the object was pulsating red, green, and blue lights and would move very subtly and sporadically. occasionally, it would hover around and then move about in a circle then stop again.

after about an hour of watching it, the lights dimmed to a soft white-light and then it took off into the direction of the horizon and disappeared.

*interestingly enough, while i spotted this object i noticed 2 other star-like objects moving about and turning directions and then stopping to blend in with the constellations as if it was trying to pass off as an average star. 

**this also is not the first time i have noticed these "ufos" at my house either. on several occasions i have spotted moving star-like objects in addition to the most prominent object that was pulsating the red, green and blue lights nearer the horizon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red, green, and blue pulsating orb hovering and then moving about sporadically in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work i listening to music when i looked up and saw this bright light it was moving very slow no noise it was a solid red light it was very bright then all of the sudden it disappeared it was very strange
content.summary: I was walking home from work listening to music when i spotted it

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke because i could not sleep when i noticed a star moving in the night sky. so i walk out a lit more to get a good view of this star. i wasn't to shur if it was moving or not so i went in and got my mom. my mom stayed in and watched from the window. i went back out to the parking lot and was looking at the night sky when a big flash of light appeared in the sky just below the star i was looking at it only stayed for a few seconds but it was big and bright, brighter the anything in the sky. brighter then the stars i was looking at. then it just blinked out. gone. i looked and looked but it never came back.
content.summary: Brighter then all of the other stars. only saw for a few seconds it seemed big.

content.detailedDescription:
In july 1991, i am watching a sporting event on television in my living room. there was a tv commercial break so i decided to look out my 2nd floor window. as i am looking up, i noticed a dark flat silouette moving in the sky. i wasn't sure at first so continued to squint when all of a sudden i spotted a red light slowly fading in and out. this was confirmation something was up there. at first, i began to think, judging by the light, that it could be an airplane higher up in altitude, but no way. i can make out a much larger craft or ship by the edges as it eclipsed the bright stars. 
i stood in awe. it was surreal that i am witnessing this. even more astonished when i could not hear an engine. it was super-silent. unbelievable but i was convinced. this was no ordinary aircraft. this size of this black silouette had to be about 2 football fields in length. i never walked away from the window. my dad was asleep in the bedroom while my mom was in the shower so i could not alert them of what i was witnessing. plus, my excitement i remain glued to it because it was traveling between 5-10 mph. very slow and silent. 
it was traveling from north to northeast, from left to right in a straight path. 
i lost it over the trees nearby to my right. 
the next day i gathered friends of mine to ride our bikes in that direction towards the connecticut river. other landmarks in that direction was a marines barracks that is possibly still there to this day. off limits to the public and next to that is brainard airport. 

these are all the details i remember that night. hope this helps.
content.summary: Rectangular shaped ufo..

content.detailedDescription: Was heading to store downtown by hinsdale school and saw orange ball in sky..Thought airplane but obviously not. flew to the left of me where i pulled over to watch it.Was not sure what it was. as i followed it i saw there was another one to my left in the sky just sitting there, not moving at all. the one that was moving flew to where it was in line with the other one where it kinda hovered for a minute doing a tiny circle motion and then the one that was still turned red and just faded out..Gone..Then the moving one did the same thing. had no idea what the heck it was or what i just saw but was pretty freaky. got home and called mother and she said there was a blip about others seeing it and that there would be more on wmur news at 11. which there never was
content.summary: 2 lights/balls.One moving one still.Was orange then faded to red and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife was out on our 2nd story patio when she saw several orange orbs rising from over a tree which blocks our view to the western horizon, traveled to the north maybe several hundred feet to the north, relatively slowly, and then vanish one by one.  my wife quickly called myself and a friend out to the patio where i also witnessed these lights. there were at least seven of these orbs with more still rising from behind the tree when they began disappearing as in the brightness of the lights dimmed until there was nothing to see.  i immediately thought they were ufos as i have never seen anything like this in my life.  my wife and i are still in awe after witnessing what we just saw.
content.summary: Rose above western horizon, traveled to north, then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Looking in the sky at the star's n seen a circular objectivity red green n white light. i thought that it was a ufo n started to freak out. we stared and thatched for a good 30 mins than we looked away for a few seconds and we tried to find it but it was gone in a matter of seconds
content.summary: The light were flashing different colors just hovering for a long time then just dissappesred

content.detailedDescription:
The object moved across the interstate highway (i-75/i-85 connector) as i was driving on a side road alongside the highway.  the object was triangular in shape.  my guess of its altitude is about 3000 feet.  when i lowered my window, i was unable to detect if it made any sound as the highway traffic was heavy.  had it been an airplane, though, it was low enough that i would have heard its engines.  the light on the object was green, but it was solidly on--as opposed to an airplane light which blinks.

pulling my vehicle to the side of the road for a better view, in the moment it took me to open my door, the craft has disappeared.  i continued to look for it for several seconds, but did not see it again.
content.summary: Triangle with green light over atlanta, just north of downtown

content.detailedDescription: I was packing truck at midnight,leaving ocean city in morning.I saw a bright orange red object,called to daughter to show mars,but it started moving a crossed sky, then seemed to change with two bluish lights under each side.Then it went grey,only lit by moon it traveled fasted up coastline, i saw round with a pout on bottom like tear drop.Very clear moonlit
content.summary: Appeared to be bright orange red ,thought was mars,moved changed color,went totally dark lit by moon flew over coast until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: At about 2100 hrs est over a period of 15 minutes, my brother and i observed five flights of two crafts approaching our neighborhood in union kentucky. initially ,they were low at an altitude of about five hundred feet.The crafts were bright yellow with a leading edge of red lights panning back and forth as if scanning for something. occasionally the crafts would drop bright balls of fire like emissions from the rear. as the crafts came overhead, they ascended rapidly to an altitude of about 10,000 and climbing. one of the crafts would then go dark revealing it to be black and circular in shape. the crafts made no noise at all as they continued to climb northbound out of sight. as a retired police officer and an airline pilot of seven years, i can say that these were definitely not like anything i have seen before. i also have an extensive background in military aircraft.
content.summary: Bright yellow orb with red scanning type lights on leading edge dropping bright fireballs occasionally

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 10 pm est, i stood on my rear porch which faces north, looking north at the sky. i witnessed a meteor entering the atmosphere and thought it might be a remnant of the perseid meteor shower. 
it was a few minutes later, as i looked west toward where the big dipper was in the northwest sky, and i saw a light which i thought to have been the international space station making it's way from the northwest toward the southeast.It started in the lowest portion of the "bucket" of the big dipper and followed fairly perpendicular with the two stars the would make the left side of the "bucket" of the dipper.
i have stood in this same location many times and watched the space station traverse the night sky and am familiar with the sight and appearance. it was approximately the same size and coloration of the space station - a white-ish orb that does not blink nor does it vary in intensity of brightness. it started across the sky and in my following the trajectory, mistook it for traversing the sky when i realized that it was not crossing the sky but going straight up, as if leaving the atmosphere of the earth.
this became clear to me when it didn't progress across the sky in the manner that the space station might, as it should have been getting closer to the northern part of the sky to exit into the south eastern part of the sky, it began to diminish in its brightness and size. it waned in visibility until it faded and disappeared completely just short of being in the northern section of the sky. i waited more than a few moments to see if it reappeared and it did not. i stood there for quite a few minutes to see if anything may have followed or appeared afterward, but nothing did.
the entire event took more than a few minutes, which initially led me to think that it was the iss i was watching, but when it didn't follow a similar flight trajectory, i knew that this was not the space station.
content.summary: Light leaving the atmosphere, diminishing as it ascended
